word: Yielding to a desire for diversity has placed the church where God cannot glorify His name through His people. The question is asked, "Why are not the sick among us healed?" It is because of the lack of unity, and love that exists in the church. [ELLEN WHITE ELSEWHERE WRITES AT LENGTH CONCERNING PRAYER FOR THE HEALING OF THE SICK AND SETS FORTH SEVERAL REASONS WHY WE SHOULD NOT LOOK TO THIS AS THE ONLY METHOD TO PURSUE. SEE MM PP. 13-16; EGW BIOGRAPHY, VOL. 5, PP. 385-388] Perfection of character means perfection in unity. "That they all may be one," Christ said, "as Thou, Father, art in Me, and I in Thee" (John 17:21). What possibilities are before us. Shall not our faith grasp them?--Ms. 158, 1898, pp. 6, 7, 9. ("The Gift of the Holy Spirit," Dec. 7, 1898.)
